glsa.title: Mailman: Member password disclosure vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: Mailman contains a bug allowing 3rd parties to retrieve member passwords.

background.p: Mailman is a python-based mailing list server with an extensive web interface.

description.p: Mailman contains an unspecified vulnerability in the handling of request emails.

impact.p: By sending a carefully crafted email request to the mailman server an attacker could obtain member passwords.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All users of Mailman should upgrade to the latest stable version:
